As Efficiency percentage lowers, all fab.message: 效率百分比低下时，工程单位施工减慢

Build Metal Storage and Energy Storage t.message: 建造金属仓库和能源电池

Energy and Metal resources get consumed.message: 建造需要消耗能源和金属

If you\u2019re consuming more than you a.message: 如果你的消耗量大于你的生产量，建造效率会变低

Resources build up over time.message: 资源随时间推进而积累

To generate Energy, build Energy Plants.message: 建造发电站来产生能量

To generate Metal, build Metal Extractor.message: 建造金属提炼器来生产金属
